message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $20000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the gesture, but I'm only able to offer $15000 for it.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least that much for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to offer $16500 for the product.

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to meet me at $16500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $19000. I'm willing to give you a slight discount from my initial offer, but I need to get at least that much for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I've done some research and found similar products for lower prices. I'm willing to offer $17500 for the product.

I understand you've done some research, Bob, but I think you'll find that this product has some unique features that set it apart from others. I'm willing to meet you at $18000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm confident that you'll find it's worth the investment.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I believe we can still reach an agreement. I'm willing to offer $17000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make a final concession. I'll meet you at $17500, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'm counting on you to make a decision, as we're running out of time.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer. I'm willing to pay $16500 for the product.
